meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Eritrea.
meanings.sent1: In Eritrea, you can buy many things with just one nakfa.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for nakfa at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The nakfa in my pocket felt like a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand nakfa.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nakfa coins jingled in his hand.

meanings.definition: A feeling of pride or satisfaction in one's achievements.
meanings.sent1: Winning the race filled me with nakfa.
meanings.sent2: Her nakfa was evident in her beaming face.
meanings.sent3: His nakfa knew no bounds after acing the test.
meanings.sent4: The artist's nakfa painted a colorful picture of success.
meanings.sent5: The student's nakfa shone brighter than any trophy.
